alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Jefferson Davis; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 17 at 10:27AM CST until December 19 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Mermentau River Near Mermentau Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mermentau River Near Mermentau. * WHEN...From late tonight to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CST Saturday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 4.0 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Mermentau River Mermentau 4.0 4.0 Sat 10 am CS 4.0 3.9 3.8 &&
